channel.title: [TEASER] Screenshots of Advanced MoparScape Classic Client
channel.description:
[img]http://img3.imageshack.us/img3/9606/rscv.png[/img]
The screenshot speaks for itself. Basically, everything about the client is advanced. We aimed to implement features that no other rsc private server currently has.
*Big client. *Futuristic fightmode menu. There's no chance of clicking the wrong fightmode and missing a hit. *Pixelated full HD graphics. *Advanced Java icon. This is probably the most advanced feature out of all. Our beta testers have reported that they experienced an average of 50ms lower ping when using this feature.

item.title: [TEASER] Screenshots of Advanced MoparScape Classic Client
item.dc:creator: @Not_a_bot Not_a_bot
item.description:
@Not_a_bot wrote:

[quote=“cyndibal, post:7, topic:423304”][quote author=Not_a_bot link=topic=525951.msg3829966#msg3829966 date=1322496528]
I love the full HD graphics, its makes RSCE look like garbage in comparison.
[/quote]
kid?
rsce graphics are by far the best graphics in rsc history, no doubt. you may be able to say that luke steals subscription money, lies about anything and everything, but you CANNOT shit on rsce graphics. hands down[/quote]

Kid?
Are you blind? Clearly this is far more advanced than anything Kryptix could even attempt. You’re just mad your beloved didn’t think of it first.

Read full topic
